featured.text: I tried one when I was a prep cook for Next Level Burgers…tasted awful, just like mashed peas gone to rot.

definition.zh_def: 漢堡，通常由圓形麵包夾著肉餅、蔬菜和調味料的食品。
definition.en_def: Burgers are a type of sandwich consisting of a cooked patty, usually made of ground meat, placed inside a sliced bun, often accompanied by various toppings.
definition.example: I ordered two burgers with fries for dinner.
